workflows.description: Retrieves a report from ZeroFox for the IP address submitted to determine if it is malicious based on the IP address you have specified.
workflows.name: Get IP Lookup

workflows.description: Retrieves a report from ZeroFox for the domain submitted to determine if it is suspicious based on the domain name you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Domain Lookup

workflows.description: Retrieves a report from ZeroFox for the email address submitted to determine if it is suspicious based on the email address you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Email Lookup

workflows.description: Retrieves a report from ZeroFox for the hash submitted to determine if it is suspicious based on the domain name you have specified.
workflows.name: Get FileHash Lookup

workflows.description: Retrieves a registered exploits from ZeroFox based on the created after you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Exploits Lookup

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all alerts from ZeroFox based on the input parameters you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Alerts List

workflows.description: Retrieves a specific alert details from ZeroFox based on the alert ID you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Alert Details

workflows.description: Assigns a alert to a specific user in ZeroFox based on the alert ID and user name you have specified.
workflows.name: Assign Alert to User

workflows.description: Opens an specific alert in ZeroFox based on the alert ID you have specified.
workflows.name: Open Alert

workflows.description: Closed an specific alert in ZeroFox based on the alert ID you have specified.
workflows.name: Close Alert

workflows.description: Requests a takedown of a specified alert in ZeroFox based on the alert ID you have specified.
workflows.name: Request Alert Takedown

workflows.description: Cancels a takedown of a specified alert in ZeroFox based on the alert ID you have specified.
workflows.name: Cancel Alert Takedown

workflows.description: Adds tags to and or removes tags from a specified alert in ZeroFox based on the alert ID, action, and tags you have specified.
workflows.name: Modify Alert Tags

workflows.description: Modify the notes from a specified alert in ZeroFox based on the alert ID and notes you have specified.
workflows.name: Modify Alert Notes

workflows.description: Creates a new entity associated with the company of the authorized user in ZeroFox based on the entity name and other input parameters you have specified.
workflows.name: Create Entity

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all entities associated with the company of the authorized user from ZeroFox based on the input parameters you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Entity List

workflows.description: Retrieves the list of all entity types from ZeroFox.
workflows.name: Get Entity Types List

workflows.description: Retrieves the list of all policy types from ZeroFox.
workflows.name: Get Policy Types List

workflows.description: Submit threats into the alert registry for disruption in ZeroFox based on the entity ID, content, content type, infringement type, and notes you have specified.
workflows.name: Submit Threat
